name: I Love RMs - Black
description:
To some it may be a another "Cheesy LDS Slogan," but for many, it will be a way to show support for their Missionary, either out in the field, just home or from the ward. Not only that but it will be helping a few Elders currently on their Missions or about to serve.

Right now we are ONLY printing 100 of these shirts in this color. We will not be limiting the size just the shirt number. Available Sizes: Youth- L, XL; Adult- S, M, L, XL, XXL, XXXL)
Make sure in the comments section of your order to tell us what size you would like.

This shirt will be printed on a Black AAA 100% Preshrunk Cotton Tee. Remember that YOUTH SIZES means KIDS. 

Shipping: $5.00 Single, $2.00 Each Additional Shirt.

Included in first 25 orders, will be a matching "I Love RMs" One Inch Button. (While Supplies Last)

name: I Love RMs - 1" Buttons (Black and White)
description:
I am helping my younger brother earn money to serve a mission. We came up with this idea, the design below, and decided to put it on buttons and shirts. First up, the buttons.

Get 2 Buttons, one white and one black, with shipping included.
Thank You for your help and interest!

$3.99 for 2 Buttons
